name: Suspicious Execution of InstallUtil To Download
description: Detects the use the .NET InstallUtil.exe application in order to download arbitrary files. The files will be written to %LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\IE\
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\InstallUtil.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:InstallUtil.exe) AND process.command_line:(*http\:\/\/* OR *https\:\/\/* OR *ftp\:\/\/*))`
